experiences.title: Software Engineer
experiences.description:
• Lead Mobile engineering for Android and iOS app deployment
• Developed and deployed two Flutter Webapps with animations and scalable code
• Implemented APIs and Cron jobs for secure cross-platform backend communication
• Automated environment switching and data migrations using Python scripts
• Established Firebase pubsub functions with OAuth email & sms sending for automated client reminders
• Implemented text, audio & video Caching using a Vector database for significant performance improvements
• Architectured and implemented a scalable infrastructure using Google Compute Engine by spinning up on demand VMs

experiences.title: Senior Mobile Engineer
experiences.description:
• Designed and implemented Flutter app modules as per product requirements
• Implemented nodejs APIs for cross- platform support
• Migrated REST APIs to GraphQL
• Developed a Flutter Web admin panel for streamlined WhatsApp Cloud API automation
• Developed a Flask server for communication with WhatsApp serve
